9e6eef43-45b6-46f2-ab9e-3c0215facf20.description: Badge earners have learnt about the Relevance of Route To Market and its fundamentals, ways to analyze the markets: Regions, channels, outlets. The participants have learnt about RTM Models : Frontliners, Distributors, Wholelesalers and eRTM. They have also learnt about basics of Key accounts, Logistics, finance acumen, Creating Business Cases, project management and effective communication. They have demonstrated the learnt skills via driving live business critical projects.
9e6eef43-45b6-46f2-ab9e-3c0215facf20.name: 1BIG RTM

issuer.summary: issued by Coca-Cola Bottling Investments Group

59baba89-f267-4f42-8605-a9d2e0948956.description: 1BIG WAPOS Academy badge earners have learned about the fundamental core W@POS competencies: The importance of customer & channel segmentation, Shopper & channel insights, Category planning, Operational Excellence in Execution & Effective Cross Functional Collaboration. 662c81c1-1113-4540-a8b9-e0592afb3b87.description: Earners of the Lead Ambassador Badge have developed the fundamental skills needed to effectively articulate our employee value propositions within and beyond our networked organization in the Coca-Cola Bottling Investments Group. As Lead Ambassadors, they are able to engage internal and external audiences through compelling and inspiring stories that attract top talents and position Coca-Cola BIG as an employer of choice.
662c81c1-1113-4540-a8b9-e0592afb3b87.name: Certified BIG Lead Ambassador

issuer.summary: issued by Coca-Cola Bottling Investments Group

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a series of training courses on employer branding fundamentals: Narrative and Design by TalentView, Powerful Storytelling by Coca-Cola Hellenic Bottling Company, and Social Media Strategy by Amazon

Passed a proctored exam on various employer branding topics including, BIG Employer Branding 101, Narrative and Design by TalentView, Powerful Storytelling by Coca-Cola Hellenic Bottling Company, and Social Media Strategy by Amazon.

Pass a practical assessment where lead ambassadors conduct an observed presentation and cascade of the BIG Employer Branding Orientation 101 to a selected audience in their country. The presentation validates the credibility and expertise of the lead ambassador.

c5d074e8-05bd-4dc5-83e2-c2a8f6d1f111.description: Badge earners have learned how to pair compelling visualizations with storytelling techniques to share information and inform smart decisions. c5d074e8-05bd-4dc5-83e2-c2a8f6d1f111.name: Storytelling with Data Visualization
